blocks.subject: Re: Porter & Hedges
text: I don't know anyone over there well enough to recommend them, so my interest
is low. However, I have no objection.

blocks.subject: Porter & Hedges
text: Are we interested in adding Porter & Hedges to our list of approved
litigation counsel?  Mark Glatzer of that firm has called me and requested a
meeting or lunch.  I don't want to encourage him if there's no hope.
